text:
Company: Cortez Ltd

Job Title: Head of Solution Architecture & Product Owner - IoT

About Us:
Cortez Ltd is a leading technology firm dedicated to delivering innovative IoT solutions that transform businesses and lives. We believe that diversity drives innovation and success, and we're committed to fostering an inclusive culture where everyone feels valued and empowered to contribute.

Job Description:
We're seeking an experienced Head of Solution Architecture & Product Owner - IoT to lead our team in developing cutting-edge IoT products. As a key member of our leadership team, you'll be responsible for driving product strategy, defining technical architectures, and ensuring successful product launches.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and maintain technical product roadmaps and solution architectures
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define product requirements and ensure successful product launches
- Communicate effectively with stakeholders, including technical and non-technical teams
- Foster a culture of innovation, experimentation, and continuous learning

Qualifications:
- 8+ years of experience in solution architecture, product ownership, or a related field
- Strong technical expertise in IoT technologies and platforms
- Proven track record of delivering successful products and solutions
- Excellent communication and leadership skills

What We Offer:
- Competitive salary and benefits package
- Opportunities for professional growth and development
- Collaborative and dynamic work environment
- Flexible work arrangements and remote work options
